entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -2.6°C

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023
